newsitem.title: USA: IKON unaware of any reason for falling shr price.
newsitem.headline: IKON unaware of any reason for falling shr price.

text.p: IKON Office Solutions said Wednesday that its operations are solid and it was unaware of any reason its stock, which recently has traded down sharply, should be under pressure.
IKON, which was trading at 23 Wednesday morning, reached a 52-week low price on Tuesday, closing at 21-1/2. It traded as high as 53-1/8 in the past year.
The company added that it knows of no material developments concerning its business or financial statements which have not been publicly disclosed.

"Our office solutions business is strong, and the strategies are in place to deliver long-term growth to our shareholders," said chief executive officer John Stuart. "Our continuing commitment is to manage the company to significantly build shareholder value over time."
